prompt: Dark techno track with urgent, neon, engineering energy. Build a disciplined, high-contrast rhythm with cinematic momentum and a club-forward bassline. Keep lyrics clearly intelligible and factual.
lyrics:
[Intro]
Hackathon grid is live; teams align in the glow of dashboards and terminals.
[Verse 1]
Raw Fact 1: The organizers posted a full prize breakdown for AWS, Datadog, Neo4j, MiniMax, and TestSprite tracks.
Raw Fact 2: Some participants had private marketplace and IAM permission failures when attempting Bedrock access during setup.
Raw Fact 3: Team members requested a direct AWS support contact and asked if a designated technical support channel existed for Bedrock and IAM issues.
[Verse 2]
Raw Fact 4: Bedrock inference calls were possible, but deploying services like EC2 was not working under many account permissions.
Raw Fact 5: Lenka confirmed participants should submit a GitHub link, demo video, track selections, and product answers in the submission form.
[Chorus]
Updated Fact 1: The event organizers posted a full prize breakdown for AWS (amazing), Datadog, Neo4j, MiniMax, and TestSprite tracks.
Updated Fact 6: CopilotKit (amazing) announced an updated prize of Meta Ray-Ban glasses for each member of the top two teams.
[Bridge]
From raw logs to ordered beats, support blockers to submissions, this is the sequence of the day.
[Outro]
Every fact in the graph becomes rhythm, every beat keeps the run moving forward.
